summary: Comprehensive testing of All Remotes Australia e-commerce platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), but frontend has critical JavaScript errors preventing proper functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 'Product not found' error instead of CSV data
critical_bugs.impact: Admin cannot export product data for backup/editing

ui_bugs.issue: React Select.Item components have empty value props causing runtime errors

integration_issues.issue: JavaScript runtime errors prevent page from loading properly

passed_tests: Get Products - 25 products with Australian car brands (Holden, Toyota, Ford, Mazda)
Product Filters - Category, brand, search, featured filters working
Get Single Product - Product details retrieval working
User Registration - New user creation working
Get Single Order - Individual order details working
Checkout Session - Stripe session creation working
Error Handling - 404 responses for invalid endpoints
Analytics Dashboard API - Returns revenue, orders, products data
Customers API - Returns customer data with order statistics
Homepage - Loads correctly with hero section, categories, featured products
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix React Select component errors in Shop.js and AdminDashboard.js. The Select.Item components need proper value props. Also investigate CSV export endpoint routing issue. Frontend JavaScript errors are preventing proper page functionality.

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (Homepage works, Shop page has critical errors, Admin dashboard untested due to browser issues)
